39 class RefereeBase : public rclcpp::Node {
40 public:
41 protected:
46  RefereeBase(const std::string& name);
47 
56  void set_play_state(const PlayState& state) {
57  // Some commands (basically anything that puts us into Setup, like direct/indirect kicks and
58  // normal starts, need us to know where the ball started when the state was entered.
59  if (state.wait_for_kick()) {
60  // We only change the placement point if the command has changed.
61  // Edge case: change the placement point if we didn't already have one (like it
62  // disappeared from vision when we first got the command).
63  if (yellow_play_state_ != state || !kick_watcher_capture_position_.has_value()) {
64  kick_watcher_capture_position_ = last_ball_position_;
65  }
66  } else {
67  kick_watcher_capture_position_ = std::nullopt;
68  }
69 
70  yellow_play_state_ = state;
71  }
72 
73  void set_period(MatchState::Period period);
74  void set_stage_time_left(RJ::Seconds stage_time_left);
75  void set_team_name(const std::string& name);
76 
84  void set_team_info(const TeamInfo& blue, const TeamInfo& yellow);
85  void set_team_color(bool is_blue);
86 
91  void override_goalie(uint8_t goalie_id);
92 
98  bool spin_kick_detector(const std::optional<rj_geometry::Point>& ball_position) {
99  // We need this for capturing points.
100  last_ball_position_ = ball_position;
101 
102  // Run the kick watcher if we need to (only when we're waiting for a kick to proceed).
103  if (yellow_play_state_.wait_for_kick() && kick_watcher_capture_position_ && ball_position) {
104  constexpr double kMovedRadius = 0.1;
105  if (!kick_watcher_capture_position_->near_point(*ball_position, kMovedRadius)) {
106  set_play_state(yellow_play_state_.advanced_from_kick());
107  return true;
108  }
109  }
110 
111  return false;
112  }
113 
117  void send();
118 
119  PlayState yellow_play_state() const { return yellow_play_state_; }
120 
121 private:
122  std::string our_name_;
123 
130  TeamInfo blue_info_;
131  TeamInfo yellow_info_;
132 
134  MatchState match_state_{};
135 
140  PlayState yellow_play_state_ = PlayState::halt();
141 
143  std::optional<rj_geometry::Point> kick_watcher_capture_position_ = std::nullopt;
144 
148  bool blue_team_ = false;
149 
155  bool has_any_info_ = false;
156 
161  void update_team_color_from_names();
162 
167  std::optional<rj_geometry::Point> last_ball_position_;
168 
169  params::LocalROS2ParamProvider param_provider_;
170 
171  config_client::ConfigClient config_client_;
172 
173  rclcpp::Publisher<TeamColorMsg>::SharedPtr team_color_pub_;
174  rclcpp::Publisher<GoalieMsg>::SharedPtr goalie_id_pub_;
175  rclcpp::Publisher<TeamInfoMsg>::SharedPtr our_team_info_pub_;
176  rclcpp::Publisher<TeamInfoMsg>::SharedPtr their_team_info_pub_;
177  rclcpp::Publisher<PlayState::Msg>::SharedPtr play_state_pub_;

179  rclcpp::Subscription<WorldState::Msg>::SharedPtr world_state_sub_;
180  rclcpp::TimerBase::SharedPtr pub_timer_;
